body: Yeah it seems like a sequel but with how the last ended it kinda weird playing out especially with how MC seems calm guess he's over her maybe? anyways the guy promised to explain and say it's a prank or whatever if she has sex with him (I think he says they were just acting?) but he's about to catch them so that won't work while he's thinking how she just have to get through this and how sorry she is or w.e and how she wants to make lunch for her boyfriend again and hope she'll say it's delicious like before. Idk this is weird with how the last chapter ended oh yeah those guys are her friends according to last chapter who were in the background.

YHiGielgin I got the impression the author was trying show her life spiral out of control, but also could be the author wants to make a quick buck lol. Hopefully the artist put the effort into the story telling
Does this really needed a sequel?

The first part was best, in that one she was facing the consequences of a bad decision and she didn't turn in that moment, but here she turn into a common slut after being rape just like any average ntr
I thought she was free after that. looks like her misery continued. as usual Futamine Kobito is nasty, but cant help to like it. her girls is too cute
i need a translation for this
